name: Domaine Saint Clair Le Donjon

reviews.text: Stayed in the Domain Saint Clair for 1 night and absolutely loved it. This hotel on a hill is a former castle so the property has tremendous charm. The hotel is located in the town of Etretat, which is located on the coast of Normandy. Our room was on the first floor and was decorated in dramatic reds, burgundys, and gold. The room was very large with a sitting area and huge bathroom. The hotel grounds have great views of the white cliffs of Normandy and of the little town of Etretat below.
reviews.title: Charming, romantic experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The plus points: lovely setting and our room was decorated with great flair and imagination and was very clean.
reviews.title: Liked it but didn't love it

reviews.text: But the decor in our room was starting to look a bit tired, especially the carpet which was pale cream and had become a bit stained in places. Nothing drastic, but could have done with a bit of freshening up. The bed was a bit lumpy which meant we didn't sleep that well.
reviews.title: Overbooked

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had dinner in the restaurant which was really good but we were troubled by the constant smell of cigar and cigarette smoke from the adjacent lounge. The dining room is non-smoking but is higher than the lounge and has a window that opens onto it so the smoke just rises up and pervades one part of the dining room. If smoke annoys you - as it does us - ask to have a table in another part of the dining room further away from the lounge.
reviews.title: Romantic stay
Caution, they did not honor our prepaid reservation
reviews.text: we are not the first one according to trip advisor which booked this hotel, but got overbooked. Fortunately we heard this one month after we prepaid, but before we went.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Maybe little bit French style, you are warned if you book this hotel
reviews.title: Colourful, characterful, romantic hotel

likes.liked: — The quality and presentation of the food.
likes.disliked: — The rough, unmade roadway you have to drive along to get to the hotel reception.

aka: Domaine Saint Clair Le Donjon Hotel Etretat
